metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12264 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Exiv2 0.26 has integer overflows in LoaderTiff::getData() in preview.cpp, leading to an out-of-bounds read in Exiv2::ValueType::setDataArea in value.hpp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12264` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exiv2 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.2
libexiv2-14 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.2').
